mapper.select: select u.id uid , u.username uname, r.id rid, r.role_name rname from user u LEFT JOIN user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role r on r.id = ur.role_id where u.username = #{username}
SELECT id, username, mobile_phone, password, salt, create_time, modify_time, expiry_time, id_num, status,createby FROM user ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, username, mobile_phone, password, salt, create_time, modify_time, expiry_time, id_num, status,createby FROM user WHERE id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(username, mobile_phone, password, salt, create_time, modify_time, expiry_time, id_num, status,createby) VALUES (#{username},#{mobilePhone},#{password},#{salt},#{createTime},#{modifyTime},#{expiryTime},#{idNum},#{status},#{createby})
